oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mvsuggest

Interface MVSQueryRequester

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalMVSQueryRequester, WebMVSQueryRequester

    public interface MVSQueryRequester
    Component used to request queries to an implementation of MVSuggest. The implementation is provided by MVSService.createQueryRequester()
    Author:
    hsaucedo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addQueryRecord(java.lang.String text)
      Adds a text record to the query
      void clear()
      Clears the current query
      int getQueryRecordsCount()
      Gets the number of records in the query
      boolean isEmpty()
      Tells whether the query contains any records
      java.util.List<GeoAreaInfo> requestQuery()
      Sends the query request to MVSuggest.

    • Method Detail

      • addQueryRecord

        void addQueryRecord(java.lang.String text)
        Adds a text record to the query
        Parameters:
        text - a text to be matched by MVSuggest

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears the current query

      • getQueryRecordsCount

        int getQueryRecordsCount()
        Gets the number of records in the query
        Returns:
        the number of records in the query

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Tells whether the query contains any records
        Returns:
        true if no records are contained

      • requestQuery

        java.util.List<GeoAreaInfo> requestQuery()
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Sends the query request to MVSuggest. Note that querying multiple records by request may produce different results that querying records independently (one by one).
        Returns:
        a list containing a match for each queried record. The matches are correlated with the queried record by the position in the list.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
